body_html:
There's standard channel for hw acceleration called NNAPI in Android 8.1.
https://developer.android.com/ndk/guides/neuralnetworks/index.html

TFL is gonna built on top of it and dispatch model to it.
Depends on how SOC vendor implemented NN HAL, the dispatched model may or may not have performance gain.

Before doing that, make sure if your model can be converted to tflite format by TOCO.
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/tree/master/tensorflow/contrib/lite/toco
If yes, then you can run your converted tflite model with TFL.

If yes, then you can run your converted tflite model with TFL.
body:
There's standard channel for hw acceleration called NNAPI in Android 8.1.
https://developer.android.com/ndk/guides/neuralnetworks/index.html

TFL is gonna built on top of it and dispatch model to it.
Depends on how SOC vendor implemented NN HAL, the dispatched model may or may not have performance gain.

Before doing that, make sure if your model can be converted to tflite format by TOCO.
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/tree/master/tensorflow/contrib/lite/toco
If yes, then you can run your converted tflite model with TFL.
